title: Hawai'i Volcanoes National Park: Leave no Trace Video
body: Leave No Trace Video                         Leave No Trace Presented by the National Park Service, this video is an inspiring testimony of individuals who love the land. It introduces the ideas and principles of Leave No Trace and the importance of taking a personal role in preserving the outdoor experience for future generations.  Duration:9 minutes, 42 seconds           Â    Return to: Leave No trace page
